contents.text: Welcome to Talener, your San Francisco-based recruiting agency for software engineers and tech professionals.
If you are looking for your next tech position, press 1.
To speak with a software engineering recruiter, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a software engineering specialist.

navigationGoals: Connect with a software engineering recruiter about open positions
Discuss software engineering roles for a veteran transitioning into tech.
I want to talk to a recruiter about software engineering job opportunities.
Please connect me with a software engineering recruiter to discuss job openings.
I’d like to speak with a software engineering recruiter about entry-level developer roles in San Francisco.

contents.text: To learn about other technical roles we have available, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a technical roles specialist.

navigationGoals: Learn about non‐engineering tech roles like data science or DevOps
Learn about non–software engineering technical positions like cybersecurity or DevOps suited to my background.
I need info on other technical roles like DevOps, data engineering, or QA.
I’d like to learn about other tech roles you have that might suit me.
I’m interested in exploring technical positions outside of pure software engineering, such as data science or hardware engineering.

contents.text: If you are an employer seeking top tech talent, press 2.
To discuss hiring software engineers, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to an enterprise software recruitment consultant.

navigationGoals: Speak with a consultant to hire software engineers for my company
Speak with someone about hiring software engineers for my veteran-led tech start-up.
I’m looking to hire enterprise software engineers for our upcoming project.
I need to speak with someone about hiring software engineers for my business.
I need to hire a software developer to help build simulation tools for my physics research group.

contents.text: To talk about other technology hiring needs, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our tech talent acquisition team.

navigationGoals: Discuss recruiting other tech talent such as UX/UI designers or data engineers
Discuss recruiting other technical specialists, such as system administrators or data analysts, for my company.
I want to discuss hiring for other tech roles, like infrastructure architects and support engineers.
I want to discuss filling various technical positions at my company.
I’m looking to recruit hardware technicians or electrical engineers to support our experimental setups.
